name: Entombed (itch)
description:
Entombed is a challenging remake from the original 1982 for Atari 2600, where the objective is to survive as long as possible in an infinite maze, collecting gems and escaping terrifying ghosts.

Written in MSX BASIC and compiled with MSXBAS2ROM, this is a MSX 1 compatible game.

Donate to this game and you will help us to support the MSXBAS2ROM compiler project!
